## Introduction

The [Hurdat Tracks Viewer](https://medium.com/@pYdeas/transform-a-python-script-into-an-interactive-web-app-and-make-it-performant-73fa3b304cdf) medium post by [Andrew Huang](https://github.com/ahuang11) describes how to turn a script, that outputs an image of a hurricane track, into a shareable app, and the best practices to improve the UX.

The script is from the [Tropycal](https://tropycal.github.io/tropycal/) Python package.
